title: Taken
description: Sometimes love knocks softly…and sometimes it breaks down your door.Anne’s morning starts like any other normal day—and ends in a race for her life. The surprise that interrupts her regular date with a latte looks a lot like Frankenstein, except this monster is for real. And it chases her straight into the arms of two mouthwatering hunks who whisk her away from everything she knows. That would be Earth.Suddenly life isn’t so normal anymore.Caleb and Van have been watching Anne for several weeks. Women are scarce in their world, a situation that sometimes forces two or more males to share one wife between them. Anne is their perfect match. Now all they have to do is convince her of that—while trying desperately not to let their intense desire for her scare her away.Then there’s the little matter of protecting her from the Guardians, who want to make sure no match is ever made…
author: Anya Bast
